entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 8.7°C

Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 1 except temperature steady near plus 2 over Grand Manan Island.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain over Grand Manan Island late in the evening and after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm except rainfall amount 20 mm over Grand Manan Island. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1 except temperature steady near plus 2 over Grand Manan Island. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
